about_the_game:
About this trial version

The trial version of the game will be available for a limited time free trial from February 24 to March 3. Players can download and play the basic content of the Terran Steam Civilization for free. After the free trial period ends, you will no longer be able to log in to the game, the galaxy map will be closed, and all trial version user data will be cleared.

□ Free trial: Download and experience the game for free from February 24 to March 3.

□ Experience race: Terran with Steam Civilization among the three major races.

□ Data deletion: After the free trial period ends, all user information will be deleted, and the user ID, nickname, and developed star field data in the trial game will not be inherited to the official version.
